hymn.title: There is a healing branch that grows

layout.singingstanza: There is a heal -- ing branch that grows Where ev -- ery bit -- ter Ma -- rah flows; This is our health- -- re -- new -- ing tree. "I am the Lord that heal -- eth thee."

lyrics.stanza: There is a healing branch that grows Where every bitter Marah flows; This is our health-renewing tree. "I am the Lord that healeth thee."
There is an old appointed way For those who hearken and obey; Above the gate these words we see: "I am the Lord that healeth thee."
